Deemos shook his head while pointing at Aerotaur, he didn't want to fight h=
im this time, it was obvious...

01 7:32 PM

  ::Aerotaur::
      He open=
s a com to Windlord.  "We need the back up NOW.  They're here, and 
  we're=
 out numbered.  Anyone that can come will help us.  But for some reason 
  =
they're ignoring me...  Finish the negotiations after the attack."  He clos=
es 
  the com and glances around.  He sees Blender aiming at Nightlight.  
=
  "NIGHTLIGHT LOOK OUT!"  He's too far away to get there this time.  He gla=
nces 
  around again until he finds Deemos.  "DEEMOS!  YOU'RE MINE!"  He fl=
ies at him 
  leading with his bladed staff.
